dc_title_s: Map of Lower Portage and Muddy Creek River Basins showing availability of underground water
dc_description_s: Prepared by RUSSELL B. STEIN, Geologist, Ohio Division of Water|Map side also contains legend and explanation of map symbols.|Scale bar lower right corner.|Text includes information about generalized stratigraphic sequence of the rocks in Lower Portage and Muddy Creek Basins and the quality of underground water.
